All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthenticationException
Exception thrown when authentication fails.
BulkEmailRequest
Request object for sending multiple emails in a single operation.
BulkEmailResponse
Response object for bulk email operations.
BulkEmailResponse.BulkEmailResult
Represents the result of a single email in a bulk operation.
EmailProvider
Enum representing supported email providers in the Huefy platform.
ErrorDetail
Detailed information about an API error.
ErrorResponse
Response object for API error responses.
HealthResponse
Response object for API health check operations.
HuefyClient
Main client for the Huefy email sending platform.
HuefyClientConfig
Configuration class for the Huefy client.
HuefyClientConfig.Builder
Builder class for creating HuefyClientConfig instances.
HuefyException
Base exception class for all Huefy SDK exceptions.
InvalidRecipientException
Exception thrown when a recipient email address is invalid.
InvalidTemplateDataException
Exception thrown when template data validation fails.
NetworkException
Exception thrown when network-related errors occur.
ProviderException
Exception thrown when an email provider rejects or fails to send an email.
RateLimitException
Exception thrown when API rate limits are exceeded.
RetryConfig
Configuration for retry behavior in the Huefy client.
RetryConfig.Builder
Builder class for creating RetryConfig instances.
SendEmailRequest
Request object for sending a single email.
SendEmailRequest.Builder
Builder class for creating SendEmailRequest instances.
SendEmailResponse
Response object for email sending operations.
TemplateNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a specified email template is not found.
TimeoutException
Exception thrown when API requests timeout.
ValidationException
Exception thrown when request validation fails.
